newsitem.title: USA: Canon to use Iomega Zip in 2 models.
newsitem.headline: Canon to use Iomega Zip in 2 models.

text.p: Iomega Corp said Monday Canon Inc's Computer Systems unit plans to incorporate its 100-megabyte Zip removable storage drive as a standard feature in two Canon mutltimedia home PC models.
Canon is currently shipping one personal computer with the internal Zip drive and expects to ship another model by the end of September.
Iomega's 100MB Zip drive is now shipping in Canon's Innova Media MT 9350 Multimedia PC, now available at some retail outlets.
Canon intends to ship the Innova Media 9800 multimedia PC by the end of September with the Zip drive as a standard feature.
Iomega's 100MB Zip drive and disks provide more than 70 times the capacity of traditional floppy disks, giving consumers unlimited capacity, increased flexibility, and a built-in back-up system.
Iomega stock was up 3/4 of a point in mid-afternoon trading Monday to 15-1/4.
